page.title: 13LEISURE.Recreation Ground
page.content: In Wrotham recreation ground there are six swings,a roundabout,a slide, a log swing and a maypole swing.Many of these sounded as if they could do with a drop of oil.The slide needed a new coat of paint.The two panels either side of the top of the slide were loose.The log swing and the other wooden swings had graffiti cut into them.Placed around the park were five benches,four were metal and one was wooden.The wooden one was vandalized The recreation ground also has a combined hockey,tennis and five-a- side football pitch.The fence surrounding this area needed some repairs,but the court itself was in good condition.This area was floodlit Although the the park is in a pleasant setting it is rather close to the M 20 and can be noisy.
